name: HOME (itch) (scumcat)
description:
enjoy a slice of lockdown life. with your cat alone at home.

hi,

this is my first visual novel,

it was created in a game jam at my uni - theme was ' social distancing'.

it's still a rough version and not yet final.

i am looking forward to any critique or feedback.

have fun.

instagram.com/scumcat2000
